name: Willie and Harv Escape the Brick and Fireball Factory!
name_original: Willie and Harv Escape the Brick and Fireball Factory!
description:
Help Willie and Harv work together to escape the dangerous Brick and Fireball Factory!

Control WIllie with WASD or the Arrow Keys and Space/W/Up to Jump

Control Harv by moving him with your mouse and using left click to rotate

If anything goes wrong use 'r' to reset the level or 'escape' to quit to the main menu.
